Brew up your brand
on our unique platform.



Brewbanner uses coffee cups to provide effective advertising solutions for companies while simulatenously reducing operational costs for local businesses by supplying free cups.

Sip,
Look,
Repeat.

On average, every cup of coffee is consumed in 30 minutes. During this time, the customer sips and looks at the cup 15 times. The cup is also exposed to 20 additional people as it's carried around or placed on a table.

Support us
in saving pets in need.

For every QR code that is scanned from our cups, Brewbanner pledges to donate 1 cent to charitable organizations that save pets in need.

Promote a cause
and reduce costs.

All local businesses in our network receive their cups for completely free. We will provide and deliver cups at any quantity on a monthly basis.
By joining our network, the establishment becomes an immediate supporter of our charity and helps us save pets in need, at no cost to the business.

Q&A

Advertisers FAQ

How can I advertise on cups?

Advertising on Banner Cups starts with submitting an inquiry form on our home page. We will review your submission and contact you within 3 business days to discuss what you are looking to achieve with advertising for your company. Our dedicated team will then work with your budget and timeline and tailor the perfect plan for your campaign on our cups.

Why would I advertise on cups?

Traditional advertisements lack the intimacy that ultimately pushes consumers to act. With social media advertisements and mail-in ads declining to having a click-through rate of under 1.2%, coffee cups serve as the perfect alternative to reach your desired demographic, and more importantly, stay connected with them for an extended amount of time.

Where will my advertisements be seen?

Brewbanner is partnered with coffee shops, restaurants, offices, gyms, and apartment buildings across Seattle, Washington. The majority of our distributors operate in Capitol Hill, U-District, and the International District. Additionally, our cups will be shown consistently on our social media, which means your advertisements are constantly seen by tens of thousands of people online and in person. With a diverse population, our research and data will determine where to best reach your target market.

How much exposure will my advertisements get?

It takes an average person 30 minutes to finish a cup of coffee. In that time, the person would have sipped and looked at the cup 15-20 times. When sitting on the table or traveling with the customer, the cup becomes a mobile billboard and is exposed to another 10-20 people on average. This level of personal connection with the customer is incredibly high and difficult to achieve with any other mediums of advertising. In addition to being physically exposed, your advertisement will be shown on our social media posts for tens of thousands of people online.

How do I know my advertisements are being seen?

QR codes are used to track visits to your website and the data is provided for you on a regular basis. We also make sure every cup with your advertisement printed on is delivered directly to our partnered businesses by us personally. We can also provide additional cups for you to give to businesses of your choice that are outside of our network upon request.

Distributors FAQ

How can I start receiving cups?

We regularly approach businesses like yours with a sample package, but we can't reach everyone. The best way to let us know to deliver to you is by submitting a request form on our home page. We will contact you for confirmation and start delivering cups to you in as soon as one week.

Are the cups really free?

Yes! The cups are completely free to you. This includes the cups, the lids, and we even cover all of shipping. From request to receive, the entire process is at no cost to you.

How are the cups free?

The cups are free because they are paid for by advertisers. All of our cups are sponsored by companies that are properly vetted by our team, and the advertisements are designed with your customers in mind. We make sure that the cups are artistically made even with advertisements and enhance the aesthetics of your business’s supply while reducing your operating expenses.

What type of cups can I get?

We currently offer the 12oz double-layered paper cup for hot drinks. They are fully recyclable and come with matching lids. We will be expanding the variety in the future, feel free to let us know if you’d prefer to receive plastic cups or a different sized cup and we will look into providing that for you.

Which locations can you deliver to?

We are partnered with businesses across Seattle, Washington. The majority of the businesses are located in Capitol Hill, U-District, and the International District. If your business is in the Seattle area, we can deliver to you for free. We are constantly looking for opportunities to expand, so if your business is outside of Seattle please let us know and we will try to deliver to you.

What other benefits do I get from using Banner Cups?

In addition to receiving free cups, you can expect our team to visit and create content at your business. We regularly post on social media for our followers and let them know about your business. It’s basically free marketing for you to tens of thousands of potential customers!
